name: Red Dwarf
description: Red Dwarf is a rarer strain of cannabis that is an autoflowering plant. This trait comes from its cannabis ruderalis genetics, which is a third variety of the plant that’s usually not bred due to its lower THC content. The wonders of selective breeding from Buddha Seeds have resulted in seeds that grow to adulthood in an incredibly short 6 weeks. This strain’s squat, small plants are easy to grow in smaller spaces, making it a popular choice for growers who want something simple and fast. Indica-dominant, Red Dwarf will eventually make you sleepy, but not without some relaxed euphoria first.
attributes_title: Sleepy, Euphoric, Happy, Relaxed, Talkative, Pain, Stress, Depression, Insomnia, Inflammation, Dry Eyes, Dry Mouth, Dizzy, Headache, Paranoid
